name: tvOS 17.2
available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Zhenjiang Zhao of Pangu Team, Qianxin and Junsung Lee

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed by removing vulnerable code and adding additional checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Zhongquan Li (@Guluisacat) of Dawn Security Lab of JingDong

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved restriction of data container access.

cves.credit: Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security and Joshua Jewett (@JoshJewett33)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing web content may disclose sensitive information. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited against versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.1.
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Clément Lecigne of Google's Threat Analysis Group

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited against versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.1.
advisories.description: A memory corruption vulnerability was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: Clément Lecigne of Google's Threat Analysis Group

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Nan Wang (@eternalsakura13) of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute and rushikesh nandedkar
